Authors:
Fernando O. Zuloaga, Osvaldo Morrone, Silvia Suyai Denham,
Sandra S. Aliscioni
Title:
Parodiophyllochloa, A new genus segregated from Panicum
(Paniceae, Poaceae) based on morphological and molecular data
Abstract:
Taxonomic features of species of Panicum, previously
classified in section Cordovensia, subgenus Dichanthelium, of Panicum,
are reviewed and compared with those of other taxa in the Paniceae. The
new genus Parodiophyllochloa is proposed on the basis of morphological
and molecular characters to include six species ranging from Mexico to
Argentina. The new combinations: Parodiophyllochloa cordovensis, P.
missiona, P. ovulifera, P. pantricha, P. penicillata, and P. rhizogona
are propose and the new genus is compared with other genera of the
Paniceae.
